pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cite 'R' Packages on the Fly in 'R Markdown' and 'Quarto' // References and cites 'R' and 'R' packages on the fly in 'R Markdown' and 'Quarto'. 'pakret' provides a minimalistic API that generates preformatted citations of 'R' and 'R' packages, and adds their reference to a '.bib' file directly from within your document.
